template.name: turret
template.parameter: int id, Cell pos, int range, int speed, int damage

template.name: enemy
template.parameter: const int id, const int speed, int health, const int damage, const int spawningTime, const bool kind

template.name: mainTower

query.formula: A[]((en0.pos==INVALID_POS || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[0]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH1[i] == en0.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[1]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH2[i] == en0.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[2]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH3[i] == en0.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[3]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH4[i] == en0.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[4]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH5[i] == en0.pos)) && (en1.pos==INVALID_POS || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[0]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH1[i] == en1.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[1]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH2[i] == en1.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[2]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH3[i] == en1.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[3]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH4[i] == en1.pos) || exists(i : int[0, PATH_LENGHTS[4]-1]) (ENEMIES_PATH5[i] == en1.pos)))
